name: tankhuntonline
description: 2d multiplayer tank fighting game based on node js and socked io - 2025 modernized version

scripts.copy-src: cp -R src built || xcopy src built /E /I
scripts.clean: rm -rf built || rmdir /s /q built 2>nul || echo 'No built directory to clean'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build && nodemon built/server/app.js --watch built

author: Radek Veverka (Original), Luke Jones (2025 Version)
